channel.title: Dimensionality Reduction on Deepesh Nathani
channel.description: Recent content in Dimensionality Reduction on Deepesh Nathani

item.title: tSNE
item.description: Recently, I came across an interesting non-linear visualization or dimensionality reduction method - tSNE(Distributed Stochastic Neighbour Embedding). Here is the original paper describing the method in much more detail. tSNE is just like PCA where you can reduce the dimensionality of data to 2 or 3 dimensions to visualize it. But unlike PCA, tSNE does that using non-linear ways. It converts everything to probability distributions. I am listing down the steps on a high level for a bigger picture.
